article:
{{Multiple issues |advert = April 2011 |peacock = April 2011 |no footnotes =
April 2011 }}

'Bourne Publishing Group' (BPG) is a small publishing group based in Stamford,
Lincolnshire UK. Founded in 1989 as an independent private publisher formed
primarily to publish a new launch, the Shooting Gazette, but with the long-term
objective of adding other titles, which sat comfortably together.

BPG was started in offices in Bourne, Lincolnshire with three full-time staff
members and a part-time secretary. It was soon relocated to Stamford at the end
of 1998 and there are now more than 35 employees and numerous regular
freelancers.
categories: Magazine publishing companies of the United Kingdom
